p: The genes including RSV NP, RBSDV p10, SRBSDV p10, RGSV NP and LsST6 were amplified using specific primers ( S1– S2 Tables) and were subsequently cloned into the bait plasmid pDHB1 or prey plasmid pPR3-N (Dualsystems Biotech) to generate pDHB1-RSV NP, RBSDV p10, SRBSDV p10 or RGSV NP or pPR3-LsST6. Genes including RSV NP, RBSDV p10, SRBSDV p10 and RGSV NP linked with a Myc tag sequence were cloned into plasmid pFastBac (Invitrogen), while LsST6 was inserted into the BamHI/XbalI sites of pFastBacHTB (Invitrogen) vector containing a 6×His tag.
